attributes.action: UK Cadet Forces should not transition to MTP pattern camouflage.
attributes.additional_details: By September 2012 the old CS95 DPM pattern Uniform is to be phased out and all CCF and ACF cadets are to be issued MTP PCS camouflage, there is in reality no clear point in this as no Cadet forces spend time in terrain like Afghanistan where this type of camouflage is designed for, in the UK it will not be practical. This is a waste of MoD spending money and time in my opinion and many others I have spoken to.
